Create a new instance of the Parcelable class.

Parameters:
inThe Parcel to read the object's data from.
Returns:
Returns a new instance of the Parcelable class. And PermissionGroupInfo pointer need to be released after used.
int32_t gaia::core::PermissionGroupInfo::getDescriptionRes ( ) const

A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission-group's description.

From the "description" attribute or, if not set, 0.

base::String gaia::core::PermissionGroupInfo::loadDescription ( const PackageManager &  pm) const

Retrieve the textual description of this permission-group.

Parameters:
pmA PackageManager from which the description can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Returns:
Returns a String containing the permission-group's description. If there is no description, String is empty.
